project.title: Buy tires and wheels in Ukraine | Online store TOP KOLESA
project.welcomeText: In a world where roads lead to new adventures, Topkolesa is your reliable guide. Since 2006, we have been providing you with quality tires and wheels, embodying safety and comfort in every journey. From high-quality products to exceptional service - we are here to provide you with the best.
project.whyWeText1: We guarantee the quality of every product, giving you peace of mind and confidence.
project.whyWeText2: Our pricing policy makes our tires and wheels affordable for everyone.
project.whyWeText3: Our product range will satisfy all your needs.
project.whyWeText4: Each client is special to us, and we strive to find a unique solution for each one.
project.whyWeText5: Over 5,000 loyal customers throughout Ukraine have chosen us.
project.whyWeText6: Our experienced consultants are always ready to help you choose the perfect tires and wheels.
project.whyWeText9: We guarantee a full refund if the product does not meet your expectations.
project.historyText: Founded in 2006, our company has forged its path in the world of tires and wheels with enthusiasm and dedication. These years have been filled with significant achievements and valuable lessons, which have transformed us into one of the market leaders. We are proud of our extraordinary experience and always strive for innovation and development. Our goal is to never rest on our laurels and to continue growing.
project.deliveryText: We understand how important it is to have easy access to quality tires and wheels, regardless of your location. Therefore, we send our products to every corner of Ukraine daily. Whether you are in Kyiv, Kharkiv, Lviv, Dnipro, Odesa, or any other city, our company is always nearby to meet your needs.
project.staffText: In our team, only experienced professionals work who will enthusiastically help you choose the perfect tires and wheels. Our managers, with deep knowledge in this field, are always ready to provide you with qualified advice, ensuring a choice you can trust.
project.productsText: In our online store 'Topkolesa', you will find a wide selection of tires and wheels from world brands. We pride ourselves on a transparent pricing policy that reflects our honesty and business principles. From well-known manufacturers to new market players - we have everything you might need for your vehicle.
project.contactText: You can get help in choosing a product, find out about the availability of the product you are interested in, and the delivery conditions, you can contact the manager.
project.deliveryShort1: All orders are shipped via Nova Poshta.
project.deliveryShort2: We are ready to deliver custom orders for items that are not in our store's catalog.
project.popularBrandsSubtitle: We have a big choice of the most popular tire brands
project.ourServicesSubtitle: Dramatically target proactive infrastructures before interactive growth strategies. Compellingly fashion global leadership skills and multidisciplinary infrastructures.
project.aboutSubtitle: Conveniently integrate proactive resources after flexible total linkage. Globally reintermediate unique value with client-centric interfaces. Holisticly repurposee.
project.tireSelectionServiceDesription: Selection and sale of tires for trucks and cars
project.serviceStationDescription: Truck and passenger tire fitting, repair of tires and wheels of any complexity, cutting of truck tire tread
project.storageDescription: Seasonal storage of tires and assemblies wheel
project.name: First Name
project.filterAsideHeaderWidth: How finding the the tire width?
project.filterAsideText1: Look at the markings on the already installed tires or in the manual for the car.
project.filterAsideText2: The size is indicated as follows:
project.filterAsideText3Width: is the width value in millimeters.
project.filterAsideHeaderProfile: How finding the tire profile height?
project.filterAsideText3Profile: is the value of the profile height in percent.
project.filterAsideText3Diametr: is the diameter value in inches.
project.filterAsideHeaderPrice: Do you know how much you are willing to pay for new tires?
project.filterAsideText1Price: Set this parameter with the help of two 'sliders' and you will see suitable options.
project.filterAsideHeaderSeason: What are the differences between tires for different seasons?
project.filterAsideText1Season: Winter tires are intended for use at air temperatures below +5 degrees Celsius.
project.filterAsideText2Season: Summer tires are effective in the period when the average daily temperature exceeds +5 degrees Celsius.
project.filterAsideText3Season: All-season tires will be able to provide safety at temperatures not lower than -5 degrees Celsius.
project.filterAsideHeaderBrand: Do you have a favorite tire brand?
project.filterAsideText1Brand: We have products from several hundred brands.
project.filterAsideText2Brand: All products are certified, covered by an official manufacturer's warranty.
project.filterAsideHeaderStudded: What types of tires do you prefer?
project.filterAsideText1Studded: Do you drive in severe winter conditions? Consider studded tires for enhanced grip on ice and snow.
project.filterAsideText2Studded: Prefer quieter, more versatile tires? Choose studless for improved performance in diverse settings.
project.filterAsideHeaderVechileType: What vechile type do you use?
project.filterAsideText1VechileType: The choice of tires is closely related to the type of your car. Cars and trucks require different types of tires for optimal performance and safety.
project.filterAsideText2VechileType: Cars need tires for comfort and traction in all weather conditions, trucks need durable tires for cargo safety, and light trucks combine both characteristics for reliability and efficiency.
project.pickupFromWarehouses: There is a possibility of pickup from warehouses in Vinnytsia according to the working schedule
project.returnsDescription: You can return the goods within 14 days from the date of purchase
project.returnsDescription2: The goods must be in the original packaging, unused, with the original labels and documents
project.managerCall: Our manager call you soon to confirm your order
